original_text: Furthermore, when I came to Troas to preach Christ's gospel, and a door was opened unto me of the Lord,
korean_text: 내가 그리스도의 복음을 위하여 드로아에 이르매 주 안에서 문이 내게 열렸으되

sentences.original_text: Furthermore, when I came to Troas
sentences.korean_translation: 더 나아가, 내가 드로아에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: and a door was opened unto me
